articles.title: European stocks open lower as earnings roll in; Standard Chartered plunges 10%; ECB set to hold rates - CNBC
articles.description: European stock markets opened lower Thursday as attention remains on third-quarter earnings and government bond yields.
articles.content:
European stock markets opened sharply lower Thursday as attention remains on third-quarter earnings and government bond yields.
